How to Get UAEU Chancellors Fellowship for Graduate Students

The UAEU Chancellors Fellowship for Graduate Students application portal is now open for the 2024 academic session. UAEU takes pride in offering a wide range of graduate degree programs, both at the Master’s and doctoral levels, with different focuses such as professional and research-based orientations.

Note:

To qualify for the Chancellor fellowship at UAEU, applicants must be students of UAEU and have high academic credentials and maintain their academic success at the UAEU

To become a student of UAEU, Click here to Apply

Objective of the Program

The primary objective of the Chancellors Fellowship is to attract exceptional students and support them financially in their pursuit of higher education. The availability of the fellowship is subject to the budgetary provisions and is primarily awarded to students in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) fields, as well as strategic areas of the country such as renewable energy, transportation, health, water resources, technology, and space.

Overview of the Program

Fellowship Sponsor(s): United Arab Emirate University, UAE

Host Institution(s): United Arab Emirate University, UAE

Fellowship Worth: Funded

Number of Awards: Several

Study Level: Master’s and Doctorate

Nationality: International Students

UAEU Chancellors Fellowship for Graduate Students | DETAILS

This Fellowship award does not apply to Doctor of Business Administration (DBA), Master of Business Administration (MBA) and Master of Professional Accounting (MPA).

Chancellor’s Fellowship for Graduate Students (Master and Doctoral) is divided into six main categories as follows:

  • Merit Fellowship Award
  • UAEU Staff and Families Fellowship Award
  • National students Fellowship Award
  • Merit Fellowship Award for existing students
  • Entrepreneurs Fellowship Award
  • Inventors Fellowship Award 

Scholarship Benefits

  • 50% discount on tuition fees.

Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for UAEU Chancellor’s Fellowship for Graduate Students, applicants are expected to meet the following conditions:

  • Applicants must be international students
  • Applicants must be graduate student (Master and Doctoral)
  • Have Excellent Academic Standing (GPA ≥ 3.8/4.0)
  • Maintain a GPA ≥3.8/4.0 during study at UAEU
  • Have no other financial sponsorship or award.

Application Procedures

Method 1: 

  • Download the UAEU Chancellor’s Fellowship Application form
  • Fill the Word document form
  • Submit it to the College of Graduate Studies in person

Method 2:

After completing the form, send via email a signed, scanned copy of the form to cgs.scholarships@uaeu.ac.ae
